analysis.description:
Lamden.decimals (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#266) shadows:
	- ERC20.decimals (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#55-57)

Lamden.maxSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#271) shadows:
	- MintingERC20.maxSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#204-205)

LamdenPhases.buy (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#514-568) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokenAmount == 0
	- require(bool)(mintedAmount == tokenAmount)
	- soldTokens == phase.maxAmount

LamdenPhases.buy (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#514-568) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokenAmount == 0
	- require(bool)(mintedAmount == tokenAmount)
	- soldTokens == phase.maxAmount
LamdenPhases.mintInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#615-623) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(mintedAmount == tokenAmount)

Reentrancy in LamdenTokenAllocation.allocateTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#356-382):
	External calls:
	- mintedAmount = tau.mint(allocation._address,allocation.amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#370-374)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#378-380)

Reentrancy in LamdenPhases.buy (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#514-568):
	External calls:
	- mintedAmount = mintInternal(_address,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#551-553)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- phases (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#563-564)

Lamden.Lamden.initialSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#279-280) shadows:
	- ERC20.initialSupply (state variable @ /unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#57-59)

LamdenTokenAllocation.allocateTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- mintedAmount = tau.mint(allocation._address,allocation.amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#370-374)

Reentrancy in LamdenPhases.buy (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#514-568):
	External calls:
	- mintedAmount = mintInternal(_address,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#551-553)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collectedEthers (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#557-558)

Reentrancy in LamdenPhases.mintInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#615-623):
	External calls:
	- mintedAmount = tau.mint(_address,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol#619-622)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- phases (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol)
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9386c0a3e4a641de38a2f054102383a6c20f24bf.sol)
